document_data.name: Elhazir
document_data.mainbody: '''Elhazir''' was the proprietor of the wildly popular gift shop named after him, [[Elhazir's Exotica]], in [[Arabel]] in [[1368 DR]].
document_data.Activities: In addition to running the shop with his family, Elhazir personally enchanted weapons for sale in the store. These were usually magical [[dagger]]s that not only aided the wielder during combat, but often possessed an additional enchantment as well.
document_data.Relationships: Elhazir was the proud father of six daughters, all of whom worked in the shop with him.
document_data.Possessions: As one might expect for someone who owned a shop specializing in exotic goods, Elhazir owned an impressive variety of magical items. These included an ''[[ring of spell turning|earring of spell turning]]'' and an ancient [[Netherese]] ''[[ring of spell storing]]'' that included the spells ''[[invisibility]]'', ''[[fly]]'', ''[[wall of force]]'', ''[[repulsion]]'' as well as a pair of priestly healing spells.
